item.description:
January's meeting will feature Angel Flight. Dick Sundell, Flight Operations and Community events will be our speaker.
He will inform us how to become an Angel Flight pilot or crew member. Answer some obvious questions. What to expect? Do you need to be a pilot? Do I have to accept all flights? How often, how much?

Some of the FPA members have asked about signing up. I'm looking forward to this. Ed Murphy was an Angel Flight pilot and has some great stories.

www.angelflightne.org

Also, OSH Raffle Tickets will be on sale.... Current prices round trip are only $225.00 range. Click the link to Kit Tucker at Roux Travel on the left side of our homepage to buy your tickets.... Or fly out :-)

We'll pick up some discussions on our upcoming events as well..

See you all then,
Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site
